serviceprofile.title: Proposed FMN Spiral 4 Informal Messaging Serviceprofile

description.para: The Informal Messaging Profile provides standards and guidance for SMTP settings and the marking of informal messages.
Regarding Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP), the following standards are mandated for interoperability of e-mail services within the Mission Network.

guide.para: Informal messages must be marked in the message header field "Keywords" (IETF RFC 5322) and firstline-of-text in the message body in accordance with the markings defined in the Security Policy in effect.
TLS with mutual authentication is mandatory for all SMTP communications. Detailed TLS protocol requirements are specified in the 'Service Interface Profile for Transport Layer Security'.
